column5: tooltip (description)
Deal slight strength damage.
Deal significant strength damage.
Deal significant strength damage and Disrupt the menu of your target.
Deal slight strength damage to the target party.
Deal strength damage to the target party.
Grant damage resistance and bonus focus.
Grant significant damage resistance and bonus focus.
Grant profound damage resistance and bonus focus.
Grant damage resistance and bonus focus. Increase spirit 1-stack on self.
Grant damage resistance and bonus focus to the target party. Increase spirit 1-stack on self.
Dispel unwanted status effects.
Dispel unwanted status effects and deal slight strength damage.
Dispel unwanted status effects and Disrupt the menu of your target.
Dispel unwanted status effects and slightly heal.
Dispel unwanted status effects and slightly heal.
Increase speed 1-stack.
Increase speed 1-stack. Grant bonus focus.
Increase speed 1-stack. Grant bonus focus to the target party.
Revive your target with 20% health and increase speed 2-stack.
Revive your target with 40% health and increase speed 3-stack.
Increase strength 1-stack.
Increase strength and mana 1-stack.
Increase strength and mana 3-stack.
Increase strength 1-stack to the target party.
Increase strength 2-stack to the target party.
Increase vitality 1-stack.
Increase vitality and spirit 1-stack.
Increase vitality and spirit 1-stack to the target party.
Increase vitality 2-stack.
Increase vitality 3-stack.
Deal excessive strength damage.
Heal and profoundly increase speed.
Significantly increase strength, mana, vitality, and spirit.
